subject: Texas Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson (70) made the cut on the number in the Texas Open in San Antonio, blasting out of a greenside water hazard to 5 feet to set up a birdie on the final hole.
snippet: Phil Mickelson (70) made the cut on the number in the Texas Open in San Antonio, blasting out of a greenside water hazard to 5 feet to set up a birdie on the final hole.
